answerText: The Home and the World [or Ghore Baire][10] The Home and the World was written by this author of the poetry collection Gitanjali, the first non-European to win the Nobel Prize in Literature.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 16 | 4 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Sandip promotes the Swadeshi movement but is mostly concerned with his own well-being. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel about Bimala and Nikhil's relationship to Indian nationalism.
